author: tina2957
title: Excellent location
text:
The hotel is situated near the lake where most of the action is on a evening it is only about a 10 minute walk. It is only about at 10 minute walk in the opposite direction to the metro station.
We only had breakfast during our stay which is very basic but was enough to put you on ! I think the breakfast is the norm for Beijing hotels, just don't expect too much.
The room was basic but adequate and kept very clean. The staff are very friendly and helpful.
The hotel is a good base for getting around for the tourist areas l would certainly stay there again if we returned to Beijing.
